00067 void orxAndroid_ReleaseMainArgs();

00070 static orxINLINE void orx_Init()
00071 {
00072   orxASSERT(spfnRun != orxNULL);
00073 
00074   orxDEBUG_INIT();
00075   
00076   /* retrieve orx cmd-line arguments */
00077   orxAndroid_GetMainArgs();
00078   
00079   /* Registers main module */
00080   orxModule_Register(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orx_MainSetup, spfnInit, spfnExit);
00081 
00082   /* Registers all other modules */
00083   orxModule_RegisterAll();
00084 
00085   /* Calls all modules setup */
00086   orxModule_SetupAll();
00087 
00088   /* Sends the command line arguments to orxParam module */
00089   if(orxParam_SetArgs(s32NbParams, azParams) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00090   {
00091     /* Inits the engine */
00092     if(orxModule_Init(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00093     {
00094       /* Registers default event handler */
00095       orxEvent_AddHandler(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orx_DefaultEventHandler);
00096 
00097       /* Displays help */
00098       if(orxParam_DisplayHelp() != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00099       {
00100         /* Clears payload */
00101         orxMemory_Zero(&sstPayload, sizeof(orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD));
00102       }
00103     }
00104   }
00105 
00106   /* Inits stop condition */
00107   sbStopByEvent = orxFALSE;
00108 }
00109 
00110 static orxINLINE orxBOOL orx_Step()
00111 {
00112   orxSTATUS eClockStatus, eMainStatus;
00113   orxBOOL   bStop;
00114   
00115   /* Sends frame start event */
00116   orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_START, orxNULL, orxNULL, &sstPayload);
00117 
00118   /* Runs the engine */
00119   eMainStatus = spfnRun();
00120 
00121   /* Updates clock system */
00122   eClockStatus = orxClock_Update();
00123 
00124   /* Sends frame stop event */
00125   orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_STOP, orxNULL, orxNULL, &sstPayload);
00126 
00127   /* Updates frame counter */
00128   sstPayload.u32FrameCounter++;
00129 
00130   /* Updates stop condition */
00131   bStop = ((sbStopByEvent != orxFALSE) || (eMainStatus == orxSTATUS_FAILURE) || (eClockStatus == orxSTATUS_FAILURE)) ? orxTRUE : orxFALSE;
00132 
00133   /* Done! */
00134   return bStop;
00135 }
00136 
00137 static orxINLINE void orx_Exit()
00138 {
00139   /* Removes event handler */
00140   orxEvent_RemoveHandler(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orx_DefaultEventHandler);
00141 
00142   /* Exits from engine */
00143   orxModule_Exit(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN);
00144 
00145   /* Exits from all modules */
00146   orxModule_ExitAll();
00147 
00148   /* Exits from the Debug system */
00149   orxDEBUG_EXIT();
00150   
00151   /* free cmd-line arguments */
00152   orxAndroid_ReleaseMainArgs();
00153 }

00174 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_org_orx_android_OrxLib_init(JNIEnv * env, jobject obj, jobject activity, jint width, jint height)
00175 {
00176   DisplayWidth = s32width;
00177   DisplayHeight = s32height;
00178   
00179   /* save env and activity */
00180   poJEnv = env;
00181   #ifdef __cplusplus
00182     oActivity = env->NewGlobalRef(activity);
00183   #else /* __cplusplus */
00184     oActivity = (*env)->NewGlobalRef(env, activity);
00185   #endif /* __cplusplus */
00186   
00187   orx_Init();
00188 }

00190 JNIEXPORT jboolean JNICALL Java_org_orx_android_OrxLib_step(JNIEnv * env, jobject obj)
00191 {
00192   return (orx_Step() == orxTRUE ? JNI_FALSE : JNI_TRUE);
00193 }

00195 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_org_orx_android_OrxLib_exit(JNIEnv * env, jobject obj)
00196 {
00197   
00198   orx_Exit();
00199   
00200   /* release oActivity reference */
00201 #ifdef __cplusplus
00202   env->DeleteGlobalRef(oActivity);
00203 #else
00204   (*env)->DeleteGlobalRef(env, oActivity);
00205 #endif
00206 }

00223 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_org_orx_android_OrxLib_onNativeTouch(JNIEnv* env, jobject obj,  jint action, int pointId, jfloat x, jfloat y, jfloat p)
00224 {
00225   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD stPayload;
00226 
00227   orxSYSTEM_EVENT android_event;
00228   switch (action) {
00229   case 0:
00230     android_event = orxSYSTEM_EVENT_TOUCH_BEGIN;
00231     break;
00232   case 1:
00233     android_event = orxSYSTEM_EVENT_TOUCH_MOVE;
00234     break;
00235   case 2:
00236     android_event = orxSYSTEM_EVENT_TOUCH_END;
00237     break;
00238   default:
00239     //error.....
00240     return;
00241   }
00242 
00243   /* Inits event's payload */
00244   orxMemory_Zero(&stPayload, sizeof(orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD));
00245   stPayload.stTouch.u32ID = (orxU32) pointId;
00246   stPayload.stTouch.fX = (orxFLOAT) x;
00247   stPayload.stTouch.fY = (orxFLOAT) y;
00248   stPayload.stTouch.fPressure = (orxFLOAT) p;
00249 
00250   /* Sends it */
00251   orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, android_event, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stPayload);
00252 }
00253 
00254 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_org_orx_android_OrxLib_onNativeAccel(JNIEnv* env, jobject obj, jfloat x, jfloat y, jfloat z)
00255 {
00256   orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD stPayload;
00257 
00258   /* Inits event's payload */
00259   orxMemory_Zero(&stPayload, sizeof(orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD));
00260   stPayload.stAccelerometer.pAccelerometer = orxNULL;
00261   stPayload.stAccelerometer.fX = (orxFLOAT) x;
00262   stPayload.stAccelerometer.fY = (orxFLOAT) y;
00263   stPayload.stAccelerometer.fZ = (orxFLOAT) z;
00264 
00265   /* Sends it */
00266   orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_ACCELERATE, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stPayload);
00267 }

00289 extern void (*ptonAppCmd)(struct android_app *app, int32_t cmd);
00290 extern int32_t (*ptonInputEvent)(struct android_app* app, AInputEvent* event);
00291 extern const ASensor *poAccelerometerSensor;
00292 extern ASensorEventQueue *poSensorEventQueue;

00302 static orxINLINE void orx_AndroidExecute(struct android_app *_pstApp, const orxMODULE_INIT_FUNCTION _pfnInit, const orxMODULE_RUN_FUNCTION _pfnRun, const orxMODULE_EXIT_FUNCTION _pfnExit)
00303 {
00304   /* Checks */
00305   orxASSERT(_pstApp != orxNULL);
00306   orxASSERT(_pfnRun != orxNULL);
00307 
00308   /* Inits app */
00309   pstApp                = _pstApp;
00310   pstApp->onAppCmd      = ptonAppCmd;
00311   pstApp->onInputEvent  = ptonInputEvent;
00312   
00313   /* Makes sure glue isn't stripped */
00314   app_dummy();
00315 
00316   /* Inits the Debug System */
00317   orxDEBUG_INIT();
00318 
00319   /* Retrieves Java environment */
00320   orxAndroid_AttachThread();
00321   orxAndroid_GetMainArgs();
00322 
00323   /* Registers main module */
00324   orxModule_Register(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN, orx_MainSetup, _pfnInit, _pfnExit);
00325 
00326   /* Registers all other modules */
00327   orxModule_RegisterAll();
00328 
00329   /* Calls all modules setup */
00330   orxModule_SetupAll();
00331 
00332   /* Sends the command line arguments to orxParam module */
00333   if(orxParam_SetArgs(s32NbParams, azParams) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00334   {
00335     /* Inits the engine */
00336     if(orxModule_Init(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN) != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00337     {
00338       /* Registers default event handler */
00339       orxEvent_AddHandler(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orx_DefaultEventHandler);
00340 
00341       /* Displays help */
00342       if(orxParam_DisplayHelp() != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
00343       {
00344         orxSTATUS eClockStatus, eMainStatus;
00345         orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD stPayload;
00346         orxBOOL   bStop;
00347 
00348         /* Clears payload */
00349         orxMemory_Zero(&stPayload, sizeof(orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD));
00350 
00351         /* Main loop */
00352         for(bStop = orxFALSE, sbStopByEvent = orxFALSE;
00353             bStop == orxFALSE;
00354             bStop = ((sbStopByEvent != orxFALSE) || (eMainStatus == orxSTATUS_FAILURE) || (eClockStatus == orxSTATUS_FAILURE)) ? orxTRUE : orxFALSE)
00355         {
00356           /* Reads all pending events */
00357           orxS32 s32Ident, s32Events;
00358           struct android_poll_source *pstSource;
00359 
00360           /* For all system events */
00361           while((s32Ident = ALooper_pollAll(((s32Animating != 0) || (pstApp->destroyRequested != 0)) ? 0 : -1, NULL, (int *)&s32Events, (void **)&pstSource)) >= 0)
00362           {
00363              /* Valid source? */
00364              if(pstSource != NULL)
00365              {
00366                /* Process its event */
00367                pstSource->process(pstApp, pstSource);
00368              }
00369 
00370             /* If a sensor has data, process it now */
00371             if(s32Ident == LOOPER_ID_USER)
00372             {
00373               /* Has accelerometer? */
00374               if(poAccelerometerSensor != NULL)
00375               {
00376                 orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD stAccelPayload;
00377                 ASensorEvent            oEvent;
00378 
00379                 /* Inits event's payload */
00380                 orxMemory_Zero(&stAccelPayload, sizeof(orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD));
00381 
00382                 /* For all accelerometer events */
00383                 while(ASensorEventQueue_getEvents(poSensorEventQueue, &oEvent, 1) > 0)
00384                 {
00385                   /* Inits event */
00386                   stAccelPayload.stAccelerometer.pAccelerometer = &oEvent;
00387                   stAccelPayload.stAccelerometer.fX = (orxFLOAT)oEvent.acceleration.x;
00388                   stAccelPayload.stAccelerometer.fY = (orxFLOAT)oEvent.acceleration.y;
00389                   stAccelPayload.stAccelerometer.fZ = (orxFLOAT)oEvent.acceleration.z;
00390 
00391                   /* Sends event */
00392                   orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_ACCELERATE, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stAccelPayload);
00393                 }
00394               }
00395             }
00396           }
00397 
00398           /* Should update? */
00399           if((s32Animating != 0) || (pstApp->destroyRequested != 0))
00400           {
00401             /* Sends frame start event */
00402             orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_START, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stPayload);
00403 
00404             /* Runs the engine */
00405             eMainStatus = _pfnRun();
00406 
00407             /* Updates clock system */
00408             eClockStatus = orxClock_Update();
00409 
00410             /* Sends frame stop event */
00411             orxEVENT_SEND(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orxSYSTEM_EVENT_GAME_LOOP_STOP, orxNULL, orxNULL, &stPayload);
00412 
00413             /* Updates frame counter */
00414             stPayload.u32FrameCounter++;
00415           }
00416         }
00417       }
00418 
00419       /* Removes event handler */
00420       orxEvent_RemoveHandler(orxEVENT_TYPE_SYSTEM, orx_DefaultEventHandler);
00421 
00422       /* Exits from engine */
00423       orxModule_Exit(orxMODULE_ID_MAIN);
00424     }
00425 
00426     /* Exits from all modules */
00427     orxModule_ExitAll();
00428   }
00429   
00430   /* Exits from the Debug system */
00431   orxDEBUG_EXIT();
00432 
00433   orxAndroid_ReleaseMainArgs();
00434   orxAndroid_DetachThread();
00435 }
